attributes.action: Ensure funding for the NHS for staff and Equipment, and to maximize the payouts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order for the Hospitals to have the staff and equipment needed to treat the patients of the hospitals, the National Lottery should donate a percentage of the monies raised to the NHS, this is a good cause that every one would benefit from, they should also reduce the amount of money paid out in prizes to a maximum figure in order that the funding does go the NHS and not waisted on Heritage Buildings.
